Text:
Has anybody any experience about DVD?Is it working well or not?

Thanks in advanced for you answer!
How do you mount and burn a 7GB file onto a 4.7GB DVD-R?  What information am I missing?

Can any one explain the steps to be taken to correctly pass the software to a DVD?

I tried burning it in a MacBook but car didn't recognize the DVD!!

Thanks in advance
You need a Dual Layer DVD and you need to make sure your burner can change the book type of how it burns, the book type must be set to DVD-ROM.  Nero seems to support changing the book type.
